description: La Pebeta is a unique farm-to-table initiative that emphasizes sustainable food production and gourmet dining. Founded by a financier with deep roots in Italian culinary traditions, the project integrates organic farming with a restaurant that serves dishes made from its own produce. It aims to raise awareness about food sourcing, promote local ingredients, and foster a connection between diners and the land, all while maintaining a commitment to ethical and environmentally friendly practices.
name: La Pebeta
